events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and I would like a full refund.
The system identified this case as a Refund request based on the customer's message about returning an item and wanting their money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in handling refund and return requests to provide quick assistance.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out about your jacket return. I’m here to help you with the refund process and answer any questions you might have.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund as quickly as possible?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the jacket doesn’t fit me well, so I’d like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process, and you will receive an email with return shipping instructions shortly.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate the quick response and the clear instructions for returning the jacket.
The refund process has been completed and the return shipping label sent. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm you received the refund and everything with your return went smoothly.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing your refund case. Thanks for shopping with us!
